Talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Oh, oops. I hadn't expected to meet
a Hylian here. What are you doing in the
mountains in this weather?<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_01>Don't you see how cold it's gotten? Our
feathers keep out the worst of it, but I'm
not sure how you can stand the blizzard.
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>That's a pretty late start. Have you gone
nocturnal or something?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Well, you wouldn't be the first. Sleep well
knowing I'll wake you up no earlier than
full dark.
Talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you go farther up this slope, you'll see
the <clr:0000>Hebra South Summit Cave<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>My friends are there now gathering
provisions. There are glowing mushrooms
and fish to be had, which come in handy.
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>They keep a <clr:0000>bonfire <clr:ffff>stoked at the cave
entrance to mark their location.<sp:0:4:0>If the cold gets too much for you, find
that <clr:0000>bonfire <clr:ffff>and warm yourself up in
the cave.
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Trouble>It's dangerous to wander these snowy
mountains in this weather. You only get
one life, you know.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>A regular bed will run you <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
A silky-soft Rito-down bed will cost you
<clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>No? Oh well. You're welcome anytime
you need a quality rest.
Talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>My friends are in the middle of gathering
provisions at <clr:0000>Hebra South Summit Cave<clr:ffff>,
which is farther up from here.<sp:0:4:0>There are glowing mushrooms and fish
to be had in there, which is better
than nothing.
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Looks like you don't have enough
rupees. Come back when you've raised
some money.
Talk1049:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh_01>Look at this thing. What is the world
coming to when something like this can
just fall from the sky?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_01>On top of which, the blizzard shows no
sign of abating. So be careful when you
travel these mountains.
Talk1014: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>When would you like to wake up?
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Good morning!<sp:0:4:0>I bet you had some nice dreams, sleeping
on that silky-soft Rito-down bed.
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Awake, are you?<sp:0:4:0>How did you like our silky-soft Rito-
down bed? It was every bit as good
as I promised, right?
Talk1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>No one is safe walking around—let alone
flying—when these things can just fall
from the sky.<sp:0:4:0>And if that wasn't bad enough, the snow
has been abnormally heavy. Be very
careful as you go around these parts.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>The moon's risen, which means it's time
for you to rise with it.<sp:0:4:0>That silky-soft Rito-down bed sure was
something, right? You looked so comfy
that I could hardly bear to wake you.
Talk1051:
<snd:Ease>They keep a <clr:0000>bonfire <clr:ffff>going at the cave
entrance, so if the cold gets too much for
you, look for the cave and warm up there.
Talk1017: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>It's noon o'clock! Time to get up!
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>We don't use words like "silky soft"
lightly. The price is a little steep, but
it's well worth it.<sp:0:4:0>The Rito feathers used were carefully
selected to ensure maximum restfulness.
It's like sleeping in midair!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Figuratively, that is. I don't know how
else to describe how nice it feels.
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Did you sleep well? It's practically my own
bedtime, but here you are just starting
your day.
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Trouble>I was so worried about having to leave the
kids behind during the blizzard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>But after it was over and I returned,
I discovered the most amazing thing.<sp:5:0:0>
Kotts had been making the beds.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Kotts! The girl who'd use any excuse to
get out of chores! She was helping out
all on her own.<sp:0:4:0>Leaving the place entirely up to them
turned out to be a great idea. <sp:5:0:0>I suppose
that's how kids grow up.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>If the day has wiped you out, then you've
come to the right place.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>This is <clr:0000>Swallow's Roost<clr:ffff>, Rito Village's
premier—and only—inn.
Talk1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Unbelievable that these huge things are
raining down on us. What is happening up
there in the skies?!
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I'll make sure you wake up on time.
So relax and take it easy until dawn.
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Want to sleep till noon? There's no shame
in that. Rest assured I'll wake you up
when the time comes.
